Html:
Hello everyone,

After playing wow for 4 expansions I've decided to try something a bit different in the hopes of mixing it up. The only issue is that unfortunately it's not very effective.

I'm hoping that someone here may be able to help create a spreadsheet and see if I can get things to work a bit better.

http://us.battle.net/wow/en/character/stormrage/Marshast/simple

Current Rotation:
Execution Sentence
Holy shock on CD
Judgement to build and then keep up Censure stacks
Word of Glory (Harsh Words) at 3 HP
Denounce as filler

I'm currently building Haste>spirit>int>crit>mastery

I'd love any feedback that you can offer, other than "lol just go ret".

Thank you in advance!

This is not the right place for this sort of discussion. The only feedback I can offer is, I made a spreadsheet at the beginning of this expansion, and it just didn't scale at all. And Blizzard isn't going to bother with the effort to make it viable since Paladins already have a DPS spec.
